name: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: A witty and romantic story about love and social class in 19th-century England.

name: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A captivating tale of wealth, obsession, and the American Dream during the Roaring Twenties.

name: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A poignant coming-of-age story that explores racism and injustice in the American South.

name: The Lord of the Rings
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: An epic fantasy trilogy that follows a group of heroes on a quest to destroy a powerful evil ring.

name: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
description: The first book in the beloved Harry Potter series, following a young wizard's adventures at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
